detail_desc: Short, flared skirt in sturdy satin. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side and gathers at the top for added width. Unlined.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with quilted details. Stand-up collar, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated, frilled trim at the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in hard-washed cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Narrow metal bracelet. Width 0.5 cm.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and an three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16x30x36 cm.
Thick socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut satin top with spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Double layer at the top.
Fitted turtleneck top in jersey with long sleeves.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut blouse in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Extra long sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs and a seam at the hem with a gently flared, pleated peplum.

Non-wired bra in an airy silk blend with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Watch in metal with sparkly stones around the face, and a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Long satin dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam with a tie at the waist and a draped, asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Feather Soft. Jeggings in soft ultra-light denim that moulds to the body for a feather-light feel. Regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip fly and button.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs decorated with rhinestones and pearly plastic beads.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a bodysuit and shorts in soft, organic cotton. Short-sleeved jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a large, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Frill trims down the sides of the top, adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, side and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons on the shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Loafers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. The shoes are partly made from recycled polyester.
Soft bootees in pile with felt appliqués on the front and ribbing at the top. Jersey lining. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hair elastics without metal clips in various designs decorated with plastic beads.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with appliqués and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.

Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood that is elasticated around the edges. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front and chin guard at the top. Flap side pockets with a button, seam at the top with a small frill trim and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in fleece.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit merino wool with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and a hood with a pompom on top.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a high waist and embroidery at the raw-edge hems.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants.
Trousers in a textured, striped weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip in the side, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Fake fly, a zip in one side, patch front pockets, back pockets and slim legs.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shirt in an organic weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam with a drawstring under the bust.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Jacket in a felted Italian wool blend with notch lapels, a loose yoke at the back, long raglan sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Tie-hem shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Unlined.
Short dress in slightly stretchy washed denim with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a decorative knot detail on the shoulder straps.
Hoop earrings. One pair in textured metal and two pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports trousers with reflective details, an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip and tapered legs.
Coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, a seam at the waist and front pockets. Lined.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.
Bolero in soft, textured-knit cotton with a one-button fastening at the front and long sleeves.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Leggings in soft velour with an elasticated waist.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, padded hood with a foldover faux fur trim that attaches with press-studs and can be turned up. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal, zipped handwarmer pockets, side pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the back and cuffs. Lined.
Short jersey dress with a small gathered collar and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, overlocked edges and ties with metal decorations.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, lacing at the waist and long, wide sleeves.
